client.apis.v1.base_class 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : base_class.py
@Author      : wst
@Time        : 2022/3/11 下午5:22
@Description : 定义各种工具类
"""
from django.db.models import Max

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, ReviewLog, CreditCurrentNode



[文档]class BaseApprovalView(object):
    """ 审批列表基础类
    使用方法（调用之前记得鉴权）：
    1. 直接使用返回结果列表；
    2. 如果返回结果字段不一样，继承此类并并重写函数get_queryset_done/get_queryset_undo
    """

    def __init__(self, business_name, company_id, work_flow_node):
        """ 初始化参数列表
        @param business_name: 业务名称，如：open(开立),transfer(转让),financing(融资)
        @param company_id: 企业id
        @param work_flow_node: 当前审批节点(工作流节点),如：open_examine(内部审批)
        """
        self.business_name = business_name
        self.company_id = company_id
        self.work_flow_node = work_flow_node


[文档]    def get_credit_certificates_done(self):
        """   初步获取x信id列表-已审批   """
        if self.business_name == "open":  # 开立业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "open_examine":  # 内部审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "open_receive_confirm":  # 接收审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "open_platform_review":  # 平台审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "approval_review":  # 资金方审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    credit__capital_company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[开立业务中]正确的审批节点代码")
        elif self.business_name == "transfer":  # 转让业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "transfer_examine":  # 内部审核
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "receive_confirm":  # 接收审核
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[转让业务中]正确的审批节点代码")

        elif self.business_name == "financing":  # 融资业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "finance_review":  # 内部审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "finance_platform":  # 平台审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'reviewing', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "fin_fund_side_review":  # 资金方审批
                cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
                    credit__capital_company_id=self.company_id,
                    review_status__in=['reject', 'pass'],
                    business__name=self.business_name).values_list('id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[融资业务中]正确的审批节点代码")
        return cc



[文档]    def get_credit_certificateds_undo(self):
        """   初步获取x信id列表-待审批  """
        if self.business_name == "open":  # 开立业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "open_examine":  # 内部审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "open_receive_confirm":  # 接收审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)

            elif self.work_flow_node == "open_platform_review":  # 平台审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "approval_review":  # 资金方审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__credit__capital_company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[开立业务中]正确的审批节点代码")
        elif self.business_name == "transfer":  # 转让业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "transfer_examine":  # 内部审核
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "receive_confirm":  # 接收审核
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[转让业务中]正确的审批节点代码")

        elif self.business_name == "financing":  # 融资业务
            if self.work_flow_node == "finance_review":  # 内部审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__from_company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "finance_platform":  # 平台审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            elif self.work_flow_node == "fin_fund_side_review":  # 资金方审批
                cc = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node,
                    credit_certificate__is_valid=True,
                    credit_certificate__credit__capital_company_id=self.company_id,
                    credit_certificate__review_status="reviewing",
                    credit_certificate__business__name=self.business_name
                ).values_list('credit_certificate_id', flat=True)
            else:
                raise Exception("请传入[融资业务中]正确的审批节点代码")
        else:
            raise Exception("此业务类型不存在！")
        return cc



[文档]    def get_logs(self, cc_ids):
        """ 根据x信id获取最新的驳回日志id"""
        reject_logs = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id__in=cc_ids,
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            result__exact="reject"
        ).values('data_id').annotate(log_id=Max('id'))
        return reject_logs



[文档]    def get_cc_done(self):
        """
        获取已审批的x信id列表:
        """
        # 获得初筛结果
        cc_ids = self.get_credit_certificates_done()
        aim_cc_ids = []
        # 有驳回日志的记录
        reject_logs = self.get_logs(cc_ids)
        # 无驳回日志的记录
        common_cc_ids = set(cc_ids) - set(i['data_id'] for i in reject_logs)

        # 有驳回记录的x信
        for cc_log in reject_logs:
            node_in_log = ReviewLog.objects.get(id=cc_log['log_id'])
            # 确定最新的驳回节点和当前节点的关系
            if node_in_log.work_flow.code == self.work_flow_node:
                # 有驳回记录且为当前节点，处理逻辑同无驳回记录的情况
                common_cc_ids.add(cc_log['data_id'])
            elif self.work_flow_node in node_in_log.work_flow.path:
                # 有驳回记录且大于当前节点，处理逻辑同无驳回记录的情况
                common_cc_ids.add(cc_log['data_id'])
            else:
                # 有驳回节点且不是当前节点的
                if ReviewLog.objects.filter(
                    id__gt=cc_log['log_id'],
                    data_id=cc_log['data_id'],
                    data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
                    work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node
                ).exists():
                    aim_cc_ids.append(cc_log['data_id'])
        # （无驳回记录情况下）检查当前节点审批记录是否存在
        new_records = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            data_id__in=common_cc_ids,
            work_flow__code=self.work_flow_node
        ).values_list('data_id', flat=True)
        aim_cc_ids.extend(list(set(new_records)))
        return aim_cc_ids



[文档]    def get_queryset_done(self):
        """ 获取已审批数据集 """
        # 获取可用x信id列表
        cc_ids = self.get_cc_done()
        cc_records = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(id__in=cc_ids)
        return cc_records



[文档]    def get_queryset_undo(self):
        """ 获取待审批数据集 """
        cc_ids = self.get_credit_certificateds_undo()
        cc_records = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(id__in=cc_ids)
        return cc_records
